message: Let's split it fairly, I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can start the game off strong!
You wanted 90% last round, I'm offering you 40% this time. Fairer, don't you think?
Okay, I'll give you 40% this time, but I need 60% to make this worth it for me. Let's work something out.
You're not budging, I'll give you a slightly better deal. You'll get 45% this time, and I'll take 55%.
Let's just split it down the middle this time. We're both losing money with each round, so I'm not trying to squeeze any more out of this. 50/50 seems like a reasonable solution.
